components.AccessTokenField.label: Access Token:
components.AccessTokenHelp.step1.content: Open Dev Tools on Facebook Ads Manager page: right-click on the page and select Inspect. Or press Command ⌘ + Option ⌥ + C (Mac) or Control + Shift ⇧ + C (Windows, Linux).
components.AccessTokenHelp.step1.imgAltT: Context menu in a browser with selected "Inspect" item
components.AccessTokenHelp.step2.content: Jump into the Console panel and execute the following {snippet} code to displaying the Access Token.
